title: FS: Abbott PSA 5 Sweet Cap back
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: FS: Abbott PSA 5 Sweet Cap back
posts.post_content: Up for sale is an Abbott PSA 5 (mk).  The "mk' designation is a bit "nit picky" as it has two very small pencil marks on the back (upper right corner/top).  See the attached photos.  Asking $52 shipping included.  Request paypay f/f.  Thanks
